</div>
   <section>
                
                    <form ng-submit="loginAttendee()" class="form-horizontal">
                     <div style="padding-left:9px;" align= "left" class="col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-4">
                     <p>Can't find the conference? Missing information? Tell us what you need help with in the box below and we will get back to you</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                            <div class="col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-4">
                                <input type="name" name="name" class="form-control" placeholder="Name" ng-model="attendeeData.email">
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <div class="col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-4">
                                <input type="email" name="email" class="form-control" placeholder="Email" ng-model="attendeeData.email">
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="form-group">
                                <div class="col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-4">
                                    <textarea type="comment" name="comment" class="form-control" placeholder="Comment" rows="3" ng-model="attendeeData.comment"></textarea>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div style="padding-left:9px;" class="col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-4">
                                        <input type="submit"  class="btn btn-default" value="Send" >

                                             <button id="cancel" name="cancel" class="btn btn-default" value="1">Cancel</button>
                                        </div>
                                </form>
                            </section>
                    </div>
